name: Wicked Times
description:
Wicked Times is a straightforward role playing game which uses real photos to depict locations and enemies. It's a "hero manager"/autobattler type of game, not an action game. As you face stronger and stronger enemies you are given a set of side activities to strengthen your character, which become essential as the game progresses. Buy potions to heal yourself. Upgrade your spell book to deal more damage and your armor to withstand the backlash of the monsters.
Awaiting are 60 enemies, 3 final bosses, 64 locations, 6 cities and 12 side activities to strengthen yourself before facing your enemies.
Buckle up for a journey to stop the demon Kugraltha and his minions.
